description: Erection of single storey rear extension (5.00m in depth, maximum height of 2.95m and eaves height of 2.80m)
decision_conditions: The proposed single storey side extension falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Representations:Two surrounding owners/occupiers were notified of the proposals.  Three letters have been received regarding the following summarised concerns:- Excessive height or bulk of buildings- Loss of light/Sunlight- Noise- work has already startedOfficer response:Based on the evidence supplied by the applicant it is clear that building works are taking place at the application site, however, there is no conclusive evidence to indicate that the works taking place pertain to this proposal, as such, Officers do not consider that condition A.4 (10) has been breached. The application has been assessed using BRE guidance in relation to loss of daylight/sunlight.

The description in the application form shows 'regularisation of planning breaches', please clarify and confirm the application is a retrospective or not.Note: The description will be finalised after confirmation.
